scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/public && for i in src/*.scss ; do CSS=`echo $i | sed 's/src\///'` ; sass $i:dist/public/$CSS.css ; done && cp -r src/images src/*.html src/scripts dist/public && cp  server.js dist
